muteAtStartLevel.name: Mute when Starting Level
muteAtStartLevel.description: Mute playback at the start of a level.

resumeAtEndLevel.name: Resume When Leaving Level
resumeAtEndLevel.description: Resume playback when leaving a level.

playbackPercentage.name: Mute When at Percentage
playbackPercentage.description: Pause playback when at a certain percentage in a level (Classic Only). Set to -1 to disable.
